etymology.description: 佛教 + 徒 = follower of Buddhism
etymology.interpretation: Names an adherent of Buddhism; 徒 functions as a suffix meaning “disciple/follower,” forming agent nouns.

parts.english: Buddhism; Buddhist doctrine; Buddhist religion; Buddhist teaching

examples.chinese: 他是一名虔诚的佛教徒(他是一名虔誠的佛教徒)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shì yì míng qiánchéng de Fójiàotú.

examples.chinese: 许多佛教徒在寺庙里打坐诵经(許多佛教徒在寺廟裡打坐誦經)。
examples.pinyin: Xǔduō Fójiàotú zài sìmiào lǐ dǎzuò sòngjīng.
examples.english: Many Buddhists meditate and chant scriptures in the temple.

examples.chinese: 作为佛教徒(作為佛教徒)，她每天早上都念佛(她每天早上都念佛)。
examples.pinyin: Zuòwéi Fójiàotú, tā měitiān zǎoshang dōu niàn fó.
examples.english: As a Buddhist, she recites the Buddha’s name every morning.
